Hotels : Hotels in Cambodia are inexpensive, and standards have vastly improved in recent years, especially in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Sihanoukville, which offer a variety of hotels and hostels, and numerous international hotel chains. Various options are available in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Sihanoukville, while comparable lodgings are easily found throughout the country, in smaller villages and off-the-beaten-track locations.
